title: Bakusou Kyoudai Let's & Go!! WGP Bousou Mini Yonku Daitsuiseki
synopsis: Rion gets tricked into installing a chip into his racing car called "Gun Bluster" by the mini-4wd company he was associated with. His car starts racing without control and causing various riots with fellow racers, Rion teams up with the TRF Victorys and start chasing after Gun Bluster to remove the chip.
characters: ['Seiba, Retsu', 'Seiba, Go', 'Rion', 'J', 'Okada, Tesshin', 'Takaba, Jiromaru', 'Mikuni, Tokichi', 'Takaba, Ryo']
staff: [['Amino, Tetsuro', ['Director', ' Screenplay']], ['Tanaka, Hideyuki', ['Sound Director']], ['Takami, Akio', ['Chief Animation Director']], ['Satou, Masahiro', ['Key Animation']]]
